text: لَوْ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ حُطَـٰمًا فَظَلْتُمْ تَفَكَّهُونَ

translation.en.sahih: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder,
translation.id.indonesian: Kalau Kami kehendaki, benar-benar Kami jadikan dia hancur dan kering, maka jadilah kamu heran dan tercengang.
